synopsis.text:
The young king, Yuuri Shibuya, has settled back into his role as the Maoh of Shin Makoku, following a tumultuous series of events. As he embarks on a journey to assess the current state of affairs, he crosses paths with Sararegi, the seemingly affable king of Small Shimeron. However, Sararegi's friendly demeanor may be masking ulterior motives, adding an unexpected layer of intrigue to Yuuri's travels.

In his role as the Demon King, Yuuri is no stranger to challenges, from pacifying irate dragons to navigating complex matters of the heart. Despite these hurdles, Yuuri remains steadfast in his mission to foster friendships and forge alliances with neighboring countries. His optimistic outlook and ability to see the best in people are put to the test when he encounters the enigmatic Sararegi.

Amidst these trials, Yuuri finds himself participating in a fighter's tournament and grappling with the results of a peculiar love compatibility machine. Will Yuuri's resilience and unwavering belief in the power of friendship be enough to guide him through these unforeseen obstacles? Only time will tell as the young king continues his journey towards peace and unity.
